TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRowId implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Maps SQL's ROWID type into Java.

remarks.para: Maps SQL's ROWID type into Java.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Equals(class Java.Lang.Object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: the object to compare this instance with.
Docs.summary: Compares this instance with the specified object and indicates if they are equal.

remarks.para: Compares this instance with the specified object and indicates if they are equal. In order to be equal, o must represent the same object as this instance using a class-specific comparison. The general contract is that this comparison should be reflexive, symmetric, and transitive. Also, no object reference other than null is equal to null.
The default implementation returns true only if this == o. See if you intend implementing your own equals method.

The general contract for the equals and methods is that if equals returns true for any two objects, then hashCode() must return the same value for these objects. This means that subclasses of Object usually override either both methods or neither of them.

Docs.summary: Returns an array of bytes representing the value of the corresponding SQL ROWID.

remarks.para: Returns an array of bytes representing the value of the corresponding SQL ROWID.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an integer hash code for this object.

remarks.para: Returns an integer hash code for this object. By contract, any two objects for which returns true must return the same hash code value. This means that subclasses of Object usually override both methods or neither method.
Note that hash values must not change over time unless information used in equals comparisons also changes.
See if you intend implementing your own hashCode method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a string containing a concise, human-readable description of this object.

remarks.para:
Returns a string containing a concise, human-readable description of this object. Subclasses are encouraged to override this method and provide an implementation that takes into account the object's type and data. The default implementation is equivalent to the following expression:
getClass().getName() + '@' + Integer.toHexString(hashCode())
See if you intend implementing your own toString method.
